action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: A black bear is walking through a grassy area with green bushes and trees in the background. The bear appears to be in a natural, forested environment.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. DESCRIPTION: A black bear is walking through a forested area with green trees and bushes. The bear is partially obscured by branches and is looking to the side. The ground is covered with grass and moss.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A black bear is walking through a grassy area with green bushes and trees in the background. The bear appears to be in a natural, forested environment.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the bear in your image walking through a grassy area with green bushes and trees in the background?
